comment: /**  * Resume the request execution by invoking the next interceptor in the chain  * or executing the request to the remote service.  * @param request the HTTP request, containing the HTTP method and headers  * @param body the body of the request  * @return a corresponding future handle  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */
code: /**  * Resume the request execution by invoking the next interceptor in the chain  * or executing the request to the remote service.  * @param request the HTTP request, containing the HTTP method and headers  * @param body the body of the request  * @return a corresponding future handle  * @throws IOException in case of I/O errors  */ ListenableFuture<ClientHttpResponse> executeAsync(HttpRequest request, byte[] body) throws IOException.
